nl.tno.sensorstorm.impl

Class FlushingSyncBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tno.sensorstorm.impl.SyncBuffer
      • nl.tno.sensorstorm.impl.FlushingSyncBuffer

  • public class FlushingSyncBuffer
extends SyncBuffer
    Special type of SyncBuffer which flushes itself after receiving a GracefullShutdownParticle from all it's sources.

    This SyncBuffer learns who it's sources are. When it received a GracefullShutdownParticle from all it's sources, the pushParticle will behave like a flush.

      Create a new FlushingSyncBuffer with a predefined buffer time.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FlushingSyncBuffer

        public FlushingSyncBuffer(long bufferSizeMs)
        Create a new FlushingSyncBuffer with a predefined buffer time. A value of 0 will effectively disable the buffer, and disable the filtering of duplicate MetaParticles.
        Parameters:
        bufferSizeMs - Amount of time Particles are kept in the buffer in milliseconds

    • Method Detail

      • pushParticle

        public List<Particle> pushParticle(Particle particle)
        Description copied from class: SyncBuffer
        Push a new Particle in into the SyncBuffer. When pushing a Particle, zero or more Particles will leave the buffer and can be processed by the Operation. When a Particle is too late to be synchronized it will be rejected.
        Overrides:
        pushParticle in class SyncBuffer
        Parameters:
        particle - Particle to add to the SyncBuffer
        Returns:
        List of Particle that leave the buffer (can be empty)

      • flush

        public List<Particle> flush()
        Description copied from class: SyncBuffer
        Remove all elements from the SyncBuffer.
        Overrides:
        flush in class SyncBuffer
        Returns:
        Sorted List of elements that were in the SyncBuffer
